#summary Ecore System Editor

Using the [Example1Simple Simple] system, this is how to save a java defined system in ecore format:

{{{
    Simple simple = new Simple();
    simple.save("simple", new FileOutputStream("temp/simple.ecore"));
}}}

Opening the file temp/simple.ecore using Eclipse 3.3 or later gives:

http://xuml-compiler.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/xUmlCompiler/docs/wiki/ecore1.png
